projects.title: Zichi Nails Salon Website
projects.description: This project is a website for Zichi Nails Salon, created as a final submission for an online course. The website includes features such as web booking, service information, contact center and location, all designed to provide a seamless user experience to salon customers.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: I developed an e-commerce platform for general merchandise as part of an online course project. The platform includes easy-to-use navigation, login and user cart, with the aim of improving customers' online shopping experience.

projects.description: Developed automation solutions using Python and Selenium to streamline business processes, including web scraping, task automation, and report generation.

projects.title: Mazz Services LLC Landing Page
projects.description: A landing page developed for Mazz Services LLC, designed to showcase the company's services and facilitate client communication. It includes a functional contact form and a direct WhatsApp link for quick inquiries, providing an intuitive and professional user experience.

projects.title: Stone Column Services Landing Page
